subject: Basketball
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: When Wilt Chamberlain scored 100 points against the Knicks on March 2, 1962, he did so in front of no televisions cameras, few reporters and only 4,124 spectators.
snippet: When Wilt Chamberlain scored 100 points against the Knicks on March 2, 1962, he did so in front of no televisions cameras, few reporters and only 4,124 spectators.
